text: The 2014 FIFA Puskás Award was the sixth FIFA Puskás Award. It was awarded on January 12, 2015, during the 2014 FIFA Ballon d'Or Gala in Zurich, Switzerland. Real Madrid player James Rodríguez was the winner of the award, for his goal against Uruguay in the 2014 FIFA World Cup Round of 16. title: 2014 FIFA Puskás Award
